productName: New Balance CK4020J4 Men’s Cricket Shoes
description: Are you an all-rounder looking for a lightweight cricket shoe, then the New Balance CK4020J4 is the perfect fit for you. The shoes combine a cushioned midsole that won weigh you down and a rugged turf outsole specifically designed for hard wickets. Additionally, it also features a durable, leather/mesh upper that is made tough enough to stand up to any competition.
